thread.title: Vijay Deverakonda and Rashmika Mandanna Spotted Together in Rome - New Year 2026 Wishes | - The Times of India
thread.title_full: Vijay Deverakonda and Rashmika Mandanna Spotted Together in Rome - New Year 2026 Wishes | - The Times of India

author: TOI Entertainment Desk
title: Vijay Deverakonda and Rashmika Mandanna Spotted Together in Rome - New Year 2026 Wishes | - The Times of India
text:
Actor Vijay Deverakonda is ringing in the New Year with a relaxed vacation in Rome with his loved ones. Recently, the ‘Rowdy Janardhana’ actor shared pictures from his trip to the Italian capital.
Tired of too many ads? go ad free now One of the pictures that has caught attention shows someone resting their head on the actor’s shoulder and fans think its Rashmika Mandanna. Sweet moments noticed by fans Vijay Deverakonda shared pictures on his Instagram where he is seen smiling and walking around the beautiful city. One picture shows him near the famous Colosseum. Another picture shows a girl leaning on his shoulder. Her face cannot be seen. But fans believe it is Rashmika Mandanna.
Interestingly, at the same time, ‘The Girlfriend’ star also posted her own vacation photos from Rome. This made fans think that both of them are together in the same place. From Kirik Party to Pushpa & Animal, Rashmika Marks 9 Years With Heartfelt Note Vijay Deverakonda’s post Vijay Deverakonda captioned the post, “Happy new year my darling loves. May we grow up together, make great memories, do great things, spread love, cheer and life. Biggest kisses and hugs to all of you.” Rashmika Mandanna in Rome A few days ago, Rashmika Mandanna too shared a post on her social media handle, where she shared that she was in Rome.
In the pictures, she was seen travelling via train and is seen holding flowers. In one of the pictures, she is seen posing with the Colosseum. Interestingly, one of the pictures also includes Rashmika Mandanna and Vijay Deverakonda’s younger brother, Anand Deverakonda. Engagement and wedding plans Vijay Deverakonda and Rashmika Mandanna have been reported to have engaged in October 2025 in a closed ceremony in Hyderabad. The couple are yet to officially announce it.
Tired of too many ads? go ad free now Additionally, many reports say that their wedding will happen on February 26, 2026. It will take place in a big and beautiful palace in Udaipur. The wedding is expected to be very private. On the work front, both actors are currently busy with their upcoming individual projects. Vijay Deverakonda will be next seen in ‘Rowdy Janardhana’ and on the other hand, Rashmika Mandanna will be seen in ‘Mysaa’. Interestingly, they are expected to reunite on the big screen in a tentatively named ‘VD14’, which will be a period drama directed by Rahul Sankrityan.
